means: 为业余爱好者设计成的
喜欢自己装配或修理东西

sentence.Network_en: Her popular pot holder is also available in do-it-yourself kits.
sentence.Network_cn: 她那广受欢迎的防烫布垫也可以自己购买原料套装自己制作。

sentence.Network_en: You can buy all these tools at a do-it-yourself store.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以在自己动手做商店里买到所有这些工具。

sentence.Network_en: The materials you need are available from any good do-it-yourself store.
sentence.Network_cn: 所需材料可以从任何好的自己动手商店买到。

entry.def: Do-it-yourself is the same as DIY .

entry.tran: （商店）出售自己动手做所需物品的
entry.def: A do-it-yourself shop is one that sells tools, paint, and other equipment needed for DIY.

example.ex: You can buy all these tools at a do-it-yourself store.
example.tran: 你可以在自己动手做商店里买到所有这些工具。

entry.def: Do-it-yourself things are things that you make or do yourself, rather than buying them ready-made or paying someone else to make them or do them.
